contest-event.event-date: Oct. 23, 1954 D Durham League Contest (Section C) Durham League Contest (Section C) 30 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-c The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) Assembly Rooms Theatre, Durham Prizes 1st £15, 2nd £10, 3rd £5. March contest 1st(£3) Dawdon Lodge, 2nd (£2) Brandon olliery, 3rd (£1) Esh Winning Colliery. Highest Section 4 band - Esh Winning. Best cornet, horn, soprano, euphonium and basses - Brandon Colliery. Best trombone - Brancepeth Colliery. Best baritone - Dawdon Lodge. 6 bands competed. March 15, 2013, 12:36 p.m. March 15, 2013, 12:42 p.m. 1 Brandon Colliery Gilbert Brown 2 Brancepeth Welfare Band J. W. Ainsley 3 Bearpark and Esh Colliery Ray White Unknown Result Dawdon Lodge Stan MacDonald
